mapper.insert: insert into schedule (schedule_no, schedule_title, schedule_start, schedule_end) values (schedule_seq.nextval,#{schedule_title},to_date(#{schedule_start},'yyyy-mm-dd'),to_date(#{schedule_end},'yyyy-mm-dd'))
mapper.select: select schedule_no, schedule_title, to_char(schedule_start,'yyyy-mm-dd') schedule_start, to_char(schedule_end,'yyyy-mm-dd') schedule_end from schedule
